doc:
Brigitte Fontaine https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brigitte_Fontaine 0 Brigitte Fontaine, (born June 24, 1939) is a singer of avant-garde music. She has employed numerous unusual musical styles, melding rock and roll, folk, jazz, electronica, spoken word poetry, and world. She has collaborated with Stereolab, Michel Colombier, Jean-Claude Vannier, Areski Belkacem, Gotan Project, Sonic Youth, Antoine Duhamel, Grace Jones, Noir Désir, Archie Shepp, Arno, and The Art Ensemble of Chicago. She is also a novelist, playwright, poet, and actress. Brigitte_Fontaine , ( born June_24_,_1939 ) is a_singer of avant-garde_music . She has_employed numerous_unusual_musical_styles , melding rock_and_roll , folk , jazz , electronica , spoken_word_poetry , and world . She has_collaborated with Stereolab , Michel_Colombier , Jean-Claude_Vannier , Areski_Belkacem , Gotan_Project , Sonic_Youth , Antoine_Duhamel , Grace_Jones , Noir_Désir , Archie_Shepp , Arno , and The_Art_Ensemble of Chicago . She is also a_novelist , playwright , poet , and actress .
